title: The Avengers
overview: Marvel’s The Avengers is the Super Hero team up of a lifetime, featuring iconic Marvel Super Heroes Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, Captain America, Hawkeye and Black Widow.

title: The Avengers
overview: A scientist who develops the means to control large-scale weatherchanges uses his discovery to wreak evil. Emma Peele and John Steed muststop the villian.

title: Blood and Guts
overview: A young swordsman implores his courage, strengthens his resolve, and sharpens his fighting skills to take down the notorious Devil Knight.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The fourth installment in the Avengers saga is the culmination of 22 interconnected films and the climax of an epic journey. Earth’s heroes will finally understand how fragile our reality is—and the sacrifices that must be made to uphold it—in a story of friendship, teamwork and setting aside differences to overcome an impossible obstacle.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
overview: The Avengers and their allies must risk their lives to stop Thanos, an intergalactic tyrant in search of the Gems of Infinity.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
overview: From Marvel Studios: A secret artificial intelligence project known as Ultron has the promise to usher in an age of world peace. But when Ultron turns against humanity, The Avengers must assemble again for their most dangerous challenge yet.

title: Avengers Grimm
overview: Armored with magic, four princesses from the classic fairy tales must fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army before he enslaves everyone on earth.

title: Crippled Avengers
overview: Disabled heroes are a time-honored wuxia tradition, attesting to the power of kung fu dedication in overcoming physical adversity. Reuniting most of the Venom Mob, Chang Cheh stages some of his greatest dust-ups, while the gang weaponise their respective infirmities for a barnstorming battle royale.

title: Sinister Squad
overview: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death’s Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains are called to fight.

title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
overview: The Punisher takes out a black market weapons dealer with stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. tech and inadvertently stumbles upon a much larger terror plot.
originalTitle: アベンジャーズ コンフィデンシャル：ブラック・ウィドウ ＆ パニッシャー

title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
overview: When Rumpelstiltskin leaves the Underworld to take over Earth, it’s up to the Avengers Grimm to stop him, but it will require time travel.

title: Avengers of Justice: Farce Wars
overview: While trying to remain a good husband and father, Superbat and the Avengers of Justice come out of retirement to stop Dark Jokester and Lisp Luthor from freezing the planet.

title: Thunderbolts*
overview: After being ensnared in a death trap, an unconventional team of antiheroes assembles and embarks on a dangerous mission. Forced to confront the darkest corners of their pasts, will the group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and prevail?

title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
overview: The children of the original Avengers band together to take down Ultron, the unstoppable robot that killed their parents. If these young heroes have any hope of winning they must find the missing Hulk and come together as the Next Avengers!

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
overview: From Marvel Studios: Captain America faces an insidious plot within S.H.I.E.L.D, and with colleagues Black Widow and The Falcon takes on his most powerful nemesis yet: The Winter Soldier!

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
overview: After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America.
